item.title: FlashAttention: Before flash
item.description: In this blog I delve into the intricate mathematical subtilities that abound in Flash Attention I recently came across. The primary aim is to unravel these mathematical complexities, offering readers a key to unlocking a deeper comprehension of the complete paper. The focus of this blog remains exclusively on the mathematical nuances, tailored to resonate with those who possess a keen mathematical acumen. Flash Attention Transformers rely on a core operation called Attention Calculation.
